text.name: shop_overwrite_messageLeasingReady
text.text:
Die komplette Anleitung findest du in der Spielhilfe.
Sie können Ihr Mietfahrzeug nun im Shop abholen.

text.name: shop_overwrite_messagePurchaseReady
text.text:
Die komplette Anleitung findest du in der Spielhilfe.
Sie können Ihren Erwerb nun im Shop abholen.

text.name: function_silageAdditiveTank
text.text: Silagemittel werden verwendet, um eine höhere qualität zu erhalten.

text.name: GLTM_TEMP_INFO
text.text: Die komplette Anleitung findest du in der Spielhilfe.

text.name: GLTM_WASH_THEN_TIP
text.text: After work with %s, you need to wash machine before unload %s

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_00_00
text.text: The LT Master is a baler-wrapper combination wich can be process a great kind of material, not only mais chaff or grass; in the perspective of the game FS17, this machine can work on fields or in farm, and can process a wide variety of material greatly faster than a conventional baler and wrapper:

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_00_01
text.text: Chaff and grass can be pressed and wrapped for silage fermentation

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_00_02
text.text: Hay and straw can be pressed, and optional wrapped for weather protection

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_00_03
text.text: Woodchips can be pressed and wrapped for weather protection and for a better storage and handling, since LT Master can reduce the volume of tipical air dried woodchips

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_00_04
text.text: Manure can also be pressed and wrapped for convenient storage and later use as fertilizer

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_00_05
text.text: All wrapped bales have a greater value on the sell point

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_01_01
text.text: Folded: mm 11550 x 2550 x 4000 - Work position: mm 13940 x 5200 x 4010

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_02_00
text.text: Position tractor and machine on plain terrain and turn little bit to the left, then you can put machine in work position with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA2;

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_02_01
text.text: Go down to machine, open right door with $input_TOGGLE_COVER; to access control panel, put down support with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA4; and set machine in work position with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA; finally set down bales chute with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA2;

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_02_03
text.text: Now you can go on tractor and turn on machine with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA; , now with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA4; it's possible to turn off/on wrapper and with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA3; it's possible to set desidered bale density.

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_02_05
text.text: 1) wrapper on/off - 2) Net status - 3) Foil Status - 4) Bale chamber fill

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_03_00
text.text: You needs to refill the baler station with net, wrap foil and optional additive which can be purchased in the shop.

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_03_01
text.text: Net and wrap foil always needful, additive is not mandatory, will useful for a better yeld with chaff and grass; necessary equipment can be purchased separately.

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_03_02
text.text: Pallet of consumable can be used one by one to refill machine with $input_ACTIVATE_OBJECT;

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_04_00
text.text: This mod add two useful things:

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_04_01
text.text: On the foot you can see information about any bales around, and with $input_ACTIVATE_OBJECT; you can unpack the bale and tip material to ground.

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_04_03
text.text: Optional equipment which can be purchased separately:
